= !UseNewConsole property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

{{{
property UseNewConsole: Boolean;
}}}

== Description ==

_!UseNewConsole_ causes the console application to open a new console window when the property is `True`. Setting _!UseNewConsole_ to `False` causes the console application to use any existing console.

When _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_ is hosted in a GUI program that has no console, a new console window is always used regardless of the value of this property.

Whether a new console window is actually displayed depends on the state of the _[TPJConsoleAppVisible Visible]_ property.

_!UseNewConsole_ defaults to `False`.
